title: Stadio Degli Ulivi
text:
Stadio Degli Ulivi is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Andria">Andria</a>, <a href="Italy">Italy</a>. 
It is mainly used for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and hosts the home matches of <a href="Lega%20Pro">Lega Pro</a> side <a href="Fidelis%20Andria">Fidelis Andria</a>. 
The stadium has a capacity of 9,140 spectators.
